column1: Where to stay (area) in Rhodes in July with the covid-19 restrictions? Worth to book tickets for 4 days with the covid-19 measures in Greece on July (what is close)?

I imagine the restrictions will be the same across the island so covid won’t make any difference in that respect. What you are after in a location (quaint or busy etc) is up to you. But whether it’s “worth it” for you to go somewhere for 4 days with the covid restrictions when according to your location you already live somewhere with a Mediterranean climate and beaches , is up to you to decide.
